law.full_text:
FEES FOR GENERAL PLAN CONSISTENCY. (Amended by Ord. No. 181,790, Eff. 8/18/11.)
The following fees shall be charged when a zone change is requested by an applicant that necessitates the initiation of a General Plan Amendment to achieve consistency between the requested zone change and the General Plan:
[FILING FEE]
Type of Application
Fee*
Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for less than 400 dwelling units, 500,000 square feet for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet for mixed use (Section 11.5.6)
$23,884
Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for 400 dwelling units or greater, 500,000 square feet or greater for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet or greater for mixed use (Section 11.5.6)
$32,116
Annexation, Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment less than 400 dwelling units, 500,000 square feet for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet for mixed use (Section 11.5.6)
$46,357
Annexation, Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for 400 dwelling units or greater, 500,000 square feet or greater for commercial/ industrial, or 250,000 square feet or greater for mixed use (Section 11.5.6)
$62,566
* See Section 19.01 V. for multiple applications.

unit.catch_line: Filing Fees - Division Of Land And Private Street Maps And Appeals.
Filing Fee - Plans And Conditions Of Approval.
Filing Fees For Coastal Development Permits.
Fees For Flood Hazard Reports And Compliance Checks.
Land Development Counseling – Fee For Second And Subsequent Sessions.
Annual Inspection Of Compliance With Far Averaging Covenant.
Surcharge For Automated Systems For The Department Of City Planning.
Fees For Enforcement Of Housing Covenants.
Department Of Transportation Traffic Study Review, Condition Clearance And Permit Issuance Fees.
General Plan Maintenance Surcharge For The Department Of City Planning.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
FEES FOR GENERAL PLAN CONSISTENCY. (§ 19.03)
FEES FOR GENERAL PLAN CONSISTENCY. (Amended by Ord. No. 181,790, Eff. 8/18/11.) The following fees shall be charged when a zone change is requested by an applicant that necessitates the initiation of a General Plan Amendment to achieve consistency between the requested zone change and the General Plan:[FILING FEE]
Type of Application
Fee*
Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for less than 400 dwelling units, 500,000 square feet for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet for mixed use (Section 11.5.6)
$23,884
Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for 400 dwelling units or greater, 500,000 square feet or greater for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet or greater for mixed use (Section 11.5.6)
$32,116
Annexation, Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment less than 400 dwelling units, 500,000 square feet for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet for mixed use (Section 11.5.6)
$46,357
Annexation, Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for 400 dwelling units or greater, 500,000 square feet or greater for commercial/ industrial, or 250,000 square feet or greater for mixed use (Section 11.5.6)
$62,566
* See Section 19.01 V. for multiple applications.

FEES FOR GENERAL PLAN CONSISTENCY. (Amended by Ord. No. 181,790, Eff. 8/18/11.)

The following fees shall be charged when a zone change is requested by an applicant that necessitates the initiation of a General Plan Amendment to achieve consistency between the requested zone change and the General Plan:

[FILING FEE]

Type of Application Fee* Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for less than 400 dwelling units, 500,000 square feet for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet for mixed use (Section 11.5.6) $23,884 Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for 400 dwelling units or greater, 500,000 square feet or greater for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet or greater for mixed use (Section 11.5.6) $32,116 Annexation, Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment less than 400 dwelling units, 500,000 square feet for commercial/industrial, or 250,000 square feet for mixed use (Section 11.5.6) $46,357 Annexation, Zone Change and associated costs for a General Plan Amendment for 400 dwelling units or greater, 500,000 square feet or greater for commercial/ industrial, or 250,000 square feet or greater for mixed use (Section 11.5.6) $62,566

* See Section 19.01 V. for multiple applications.
